card.name: Call of the Grave
card.description: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 random non-{{RARITY:TOKEN}} {{KW:DUST}} monsters costing 3 or less {{GOLD}} from your dustpile.

description.now: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 random non-{{RARITY:TOKEN}} {{KW:DUST}} monsters costing 3 or less {{GOLD}} from your dustpile.
description.prev: Summon a 1/1 copy of 3 random different non-{{RARITY:TOKEN}} {{KW:DUST}} monsters from your dustpile with a {{COST}} of 3 or less.
